competitors.name: Wave Financial

competitors.name: H&R Block
competitors.notes: Top tax preparation competitor with 12,000+ physical locations, acquired Wave

competitors.name: TaxACT

competitors.name: Credit Karma
competitors.notes: Free tax filing competitor (acquired by Intuit for $7B in 2020)

context: Intuit Inc. is a financial software company focused on TurboTax, QuickBooks, Credit Karma, and Mailchimp. Acquired Credit Karma for $7.1B and Mailchimp for $12B.
